sqlquery.name: BaseProcessLog.BaseOn_OneDealProcessSelect
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ C700000057 as BaseOpenDateTime, C700020121 as logUserCorp, C700020122 as logUserCorpID, C700020123 as logUserDep, C700020124 as logUserDepID, C700020125 as logUserDN, C700020126 as logUserDNID, C700020401 as ProcessID, C700020402 as Act, C700020403 as logUser, C700020404 as logUserID, C700020405 as StDate, C700020406 as Result, C700020407 as ProcessLogBaseID, C700020408 as ProcessLogBaseSchema, C700020409 as FlagStart /*COUNT*/ from {WF:App_DealProcessLog} DealProcessLog where $BaseOn_OneDealProcess$ order by C700020405 asc

sqlquery.name: BaseProcessLog.BaseOn_OneAuditingProcessSelect
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ C700000057 as BaseOpenDateTime, C700020121 as logUserCorp, C700020122 as logUserCorpID, C700020123 as logUserDep, C700020124 as logUserDepID, C700020125 as logUserDN, C700020126 as logUserDNID, C700020401 as ProcessID, C700020402 as Act, C700020403 as logUser, C700020404 as logUserID, C700020405 as StDate, C700020406 as Result, C700020407 as ProcessLogBaseID, C700020408 as ProcessLogBaseSchema, C700020409 as FlagStart /*COUNT*/ from {WF:App_AuditingProcessLog} AuditingProcessLog where $BaseOn_OneAuditingProcess$ order by C700020405 asc
